Articles.Content: The game stay like this when I try to run it.
Thread moved to the support sub and good luck with your issue.

Have you checked that the process isn’t running?  It could be minimized.

Have you tried running the EXE directly?

I got the EPIC version, The game never gets off desktop, and when I trieds the exe directly, the game loaded but there are no parachutes...the first training mission I couldn't select it to install on the rocket since it never showed up under Utilities (or any other category), so I tried the second mission and it said invalid parachute missing or something and I couldn't  get off the screen with the birds eye view of the base.

It is unplayable...vanilla game on EPIC.
